common.search_placeholder: Search by Address / Txn Hash / Block Height
common.network_box: Note: You are currently connected to the Glitch {{network}}

transactionDetails.title: Transaction details
transactionDetails.not_found: Sorry, the transaction could not be found.
transactionDetails.hash_tip: A Hash or transaction hash is a unique 66 characters identifier that is generated whenever a transaction is executed.
transactionDetails.block_tip: The number of the block in which the transaction was recorded.
transactionDetails.time_tip: The date and time at which a transaction is confirmed.
transactionDetails.from_tip: The sending party of the transaction (could be from a contract address).
transactionDetails.to_tip: The receiving party of the transaction (could be a contract address).
transactionDetails.amount_tip: The amount of GLCH is sent in the transaction.
transactionDetails.fee_tip: Amount paid to the miner for processing the transaction.

blockDetails.title: Block Details
blockDetails.height_tip: Also known as Block Number. The block height, which indicates the length of the blockchain, increases after the addition of the new block.
blockDetails.epoch_slot_tip: It’s the period of time it takes for a specific number of blocks to be finalized on the chain.
blockDetails.time_tip: The date and time at which a transaction is confirmed.
blockDetails.txs_tip: Total confirmed transactions in this block.
blockDetails.reward_tip: The block reward is shared for the validator which confirms this block successfully and stakers who vote for this validator as defined in consensus of Glitch network.
blockDetails.size_tip: The maximum limit a block can be filled up with transactions.
blockDetails.hash_tip: A Hash or transaction hash is a unique 66 characters identifier that is generated whenever a transaction is executed.
blockDetails.validator_tip: The person who successfully validates transactions and confirms this block in Glitch network.

notFoundPage.go_back_home_page: Go back to the Home page

searchNotFoundPage.oops2: among the information stored on blockchains. Recheck the phrase and try again.

walletPage.scan_qr_code: Scan the QR-Code with you application

chartsAndStats.daily_price_chart_show: The GLCH Daily Price (USD) chart shows the daily historical price for GLCH in USD.
chartsAndStats.the_glitch_market_capitalization: The Glitch Market Capitalization chart shows the historical breakdown of GLCH daily market capitalization and average price.
chartsAndStats.average_block_time_chart: The chart shows the average block time
chartsAndStats.the_chart_highlights: The chart highlights the total number of transactions on the Glitch blockchain with daily individual breakdown for average difficulty, estimated hash rate, average block time and size, total block and and total new address seen.
chartsAndStats.the_chart_shows_the_number_of_grc20: The chart shows the number of GRC20 tokens transferred daily.
chartsAndStats.the_glitch_block_count: The Glitch Block Count and Rewards Chart shows the historical number of blocks produced daily on the Glitch network and the total block reward.
chartsAndStats.the_glitch_network_hash_rate: The Glitch Network Hash Rate Chart shows the historical measure of the processing power of the Glitch network.
chartsAndStats.the_glitch_difficulty_chart: The Glitch Network Difficulty Chart displays the mining difficulty and the historical value of the Glitch network.
chartsAndStats.the_glitch_network_transaction: The Glitch Network Transaction Fee Chart shows historical total number of Glitch paid as transaction fee for the Glitch network.

contactPage.create_success: We have received your message. We will get in touch with you shortly.

footer.glitch_info: Glitch explorer is a Block producers explorer for Glitch, a decentralized smart contracts platform using DPOS protocol
